reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Providing and distributing food, shelter and non-food items to Saada Governorate (Phase I).

description.narrative: Empowering families affected by the conflict and the most vulnerable to access food, shelter and non-food items in Sa'ada governorate and IDPs in Al-Jawf, Marib and Hadramout.

Providing food baskets, shelter materials and non-food items from inside the Kingdom and transporting them to the implementing partner's warehouses inside Yemen to benefit the most affected families in the directorates of Saada governorate and Saada IDPs in (Al-Jouf, Marib, Hadramout). • Distribution of 16,800 food baskets to the most needy families in the governorates of Sa'ada governorate • Distribution of (13,200) food baskets to be distributed to Saada IDPs in the following governorates: Al-Jouf / Marib / Hadramout. • Distribution of 850 tents, 1,700 blankets and 3,400 shelter bags to families in the districts of Sa'ada governorate • Distribution of (650) tents and (1,300) blankets and (2,600) shelter bags to be distributed to Saada IDPs in the following governorates: Al-Jouf, Marib, Hadramout.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
